1.title: OB Noodle House vs. South Beach Bar & Grill
1.plot: It's a Barmaggedon turf war when two San Diego bars, and direct competitors, battle it out. What happens when the owners swap, and they get to boss around the competition for $10,000? Watch to find out!

2.title: Tondee's Tavern vs. Bootleggers (Savannah)
2.plot: Tempers flare in Savannah when tourist bar Tondee's goes up against local hangout "Bootleggers." And when the owners swap, the staffs wage all-out war. Who will bring home the $10,000 in Savannah? Watch to find out!

3.title: Blu Cantina vs. Anchor Bar & Tattoo
3.plot: It's profit vs. pleasure when a businesswoman with a mind for numbers goes up against an NFL player who's all about spectacle. Will the numbers game tame the party bar, or will Anchor leave a permanent mark on Cantina?

4.title: Zunzi's 2 vs. Distillery Ale House
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: The Allie Way vs. Oficina Latina
5.plot: It's a clash of cultures in NYC when Paolo, a passionate Italian, takes on Allie, a straight-laced uptown girl. Will Allie turn Latin love into American profits, or will The Paolo Way triumph over The Allie Way?"

6.title: Zunzi's 2 vs. Distillery Ale House
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Wild Beaver Saloon vs. The Clubhouse
7.plot: In the musical city of Nashville, the competition hits a high note when The Clubhouse's Jade, a rookie with fresh ideas, takes on Wild Beaver Saloon's Will, a maverick whose sights are set on industry domination.

8.title: Two Bits vs 67 Orange St
8.plot: It's a tale of two New York Cities when Karl's fancy-cocktailed Harlem speakeasy takes on Perry's Lower East Side dive ruled by pinball and cheap beer. Can Karl win it at Two-Bits, or will Perry prevail at 67?

0.title: Holy Frijoles vs. Fredrick's on Fleet
0.plot: It's the ultimate Baltimore bar battle when former boxer and zero tolerance mixologist Jim, goes up against Geoff, a free-pouring, free spirit who loves cheap margaritas and free hugs.

1.title: The Attic vs. FairyTail Lounge
1.plot: It's "Queens vs. Queens" in this episode, as the owner of a local dive bar in Queens, NY goes up against the owner of a Manhattan gay bar complete with drag queens. Will the switch go smoothly? Watch to find out!

2.title: Iron Horse Tavern vs. Prohibition
2.plot: On this episode, it's uptown class vs. downtown flash, as a swanky Manhattan speakeasy trades bars with a downtown dive, complete with a swing hanging over the bar. Owner Michael rules Bar Prohibition with precision, pushing meticulously crafted cocktails with buttoned-up customer service, while at The Iron Horse NYC, owner Ziggy ignores complicated drinks in favor of a raucous party complete with underdressed swinging and dancing bartenders.

3.title: Lucey's Lounge vs. Manitoba's
3.plot: In this "Battle of the Boroughs" episode of Barmaggedon, an East Village punk rocker takes on a Brooklyn Hipster. "Handsome Dick" Manitoba is the lead singer of The Dictators and owner of Manitoba's - a punk rock dive bar whose main attraction is "Handsome Dick" himself. He's up against Henry, a cocktail connoisseur whose Brooklyn hipster bar is known for their intricate hand-made drinks. So which bar owner will be crowned King of New York? Watch to find out!

4.title: Brass Monkey Tavern vs. Kevro's Art Bar
4.plot: In South Florida, no-nonsense sports bar owner Marty takes on "Kevro", an anti-TV hippie who owns an "art bar". Marty's focus is on making money, and at Brass Monkey that means plastering the bar with TVs and hiring sexy bartenders in tight dresses; Kevro plasters his Art Bar with his homemade paintings, and thinks building relationships through communication and love is key. So do sports and sex sell, or will love conquer all? Watch to find out!

5.title: The Zebra Lounge vs. Windy City Inn
5.plot: It's sex vs. sensibility in Chicago when the fun-loving owner of a sultry piano bar takes on the no-nonsense owner of a neighborhood dive. At Zebra Lounge, owner Michael runs his bar with free-flowing alcohol and drunken debauchery from staff; meanwhile the tough-as-nails owner of Windy City, Andrea, focuses on strict rules and a killer meat-filled Bloody Mary. Will Andrea tame the Zebra Lounge, or will Michael create a tornado at Windy City? Watch to find out!

6.title: Player's Pub & Grill vs. Art's Tavern
6.plot: It's high school all over again when the jocks take on the punks in Chicago. Player's Pub owner Dave D. is a loud-mouth jock who runs his sports bar by focusing on teamwork and customer service; Art's Tavern owner Dave L., believes anarchy equals fun, and runs his chaotic dive bar without rules. Can the sports guy with a set of brass "baseballs" make order out of chaos at Art's, or will the punk kid's laid-back style wreak havoc on Player's Pub? Watch to find out!

7.title: Bottega Wine Bar vs. Beer Trade Co.
7.plot: An uptight wine bar owner with a mind for business takes on a laid-back beer bar owner who's so chill, he lets customers serve themselves. At Beer Trade Co., Gene's unique self-serve concept and carefully crafted menu draws a crowd; at Bottega, Simon is a tough boss who focuses more on money than his food and wine menu. Can Gene's chill attitude and cool concept bring in waves of cash to the wine bar, or will Simon's fiery style smoke the competition?

8.title: Jumby Bay Island Grill vs. Suri Tapas
8.plot: It's a tale of two South Florida bars, as tough talking Matt takes on softhearted Vicky. Will Vicky's sweet nature be a breath of fresh air for Suri? Or will Matt's no-nonsense attitude improve Jumby Bay?

10.title: Gossip Grill vs. Single Fin
10.plot: Sunny San Diego gets even hotter when Moe and the party girls at Gossip Grill take on Dominic and the surfer dudes at Single Fin. Will Dominic dominate Gossip Grill or will Moe prevail at Single Fin? Watch to find out!

imdb.plot outline: Welcome to the fun one-hour show that pits two bar owners against each other. In each episode, comedian Mo Mandel travels to a different city and settles once and for all, which bar owner has the best recipe for success. The goal is to see who can turn the most profit - but there's one small catch: each bar owner has to run the other owner's bar! It's an enjoyable rollercoaster ride of comical conflicts and one-upmanship, as the bosses compete to see who can win over new staff and customers with their charm and skill.
imdb.title: Barmageddon
plot: Welcome to the fun one-hour show that pits two bar owners against each other. In each episode, comedian Mo Mandel travels to a different city and settles once and for all, which bar owner has the best recipe for success. The goal is to see who can turn the most profit - but there's one small catch: each bar owner has to run the other owner's bar! It's an enjoyable rollercoaster ride of comical conflicts and one-upmanship, as the bosses compete to see who can win over new staff and customers with their charm and skill.
